brand.name: Wells Fargo
brand.description: Find the right financial solutions for your business needs.

searchResults.adDescription: Open a Business Checking Account with Wells Fargo. Enjoy Online Banking, Mobile App & Trusted Support. Find the Right Account for Your Business Needs.

checking.title: Small Business Checking Accounts
checking.subtitle: Choose the right account for your business needs.

accounts.name: Initiate Business Checking
accounts.description: For small businesses with basic banking needs.
features: Up to 100 transactions per month at no charge
Up to $5,000 in cash deposits per month with no cash deposit processing fee
Digital banking tools to manage your business on the go
Debit card with Zero Liability protection
accounts.whyChoose: Perfect for new businesses or those with basic banking needs requiring simple cash management solutions.
accounts.additionalInfo: The Initiate account provides essential business banking services at a low monthly cost, with multiple ways to waive the fee.

accounts.name: Navigate Business Checking
accounts.description: For growing businesses with moderate transaction volume.
features: Up to 250 transactions per month at no charge
Up to $20,000 in cash deposits per month with no cash deposit processing fee
Mobile banking and mobile check deposit
accounts.whyChoose: Perfect for businesses that have outgrown basic checking but don't need complex treasury management services.
accounts.additionalInfo: The Navigate account grows with your business, adapting to your changing needs.

accounts.name: Optimize Business Checking
accounts.description: For established businesses with complex needs.
features: No fees for stop payments, cashier's checks, and money orders
Up to five outgoing wires per statement period at no charge
Relationship pricing on business loans and lines of credit
accounts.whyChoose: Designed for established businesses with sophisticated banking needs and high transaction volume.
accounts.additionalInfo: Access to dedicated relationship managers and advanced treasury management tools.

otherProducts.title: Merchant Services
otherProducts.description: Accept payments anywhere your business takes you.

initiate.summary: New small business owner called inquiring about the most affordable checking option. Agent explained the Initiate account benefits and fee waiver options. Customer had questions about mobile deposit limits and online banking features. Agent provided detailed explanations and helped customer understand minimum balance requirements.

navigate.summary: Customer called regarding opening a new business checking account for their startup consulting business. Agent explained the benefits of the Navigate account's higher transaction limits compared to Initiate. Customer expressed interest in mobile banking features and was particularly concerned about waiving monthly fees. Agent scheduled an in-branch appointment to complete the application.

sentiment.label: Very Positive
sentiment.positives: Personalized service, comprehensive explanations, excellent rapport

optimize.summary: Business owner called regarding premium checking options for their established manufacturing business. Agent provided detailed explanation of Optimize account treasury management services and earnings credit opportunities. Customer appreciated the relationship manager assignment and discussed international wire transfer needs. Agent scheduled a meeting with treasury specialist and relationship manager.

premiumInsights.businessContext: Established manufacturing business with international operations and $4.2M annual revenue. Seeking improved treasury management.
premiumInsights.crossSell: Business credit line (94% match), international services (88% match), merchant services (76% match)
